content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Fin de semana':

content.stimulus_en: He (plan) ________ to go camping.
Are you ________ (go) away for the holidays?
We (go) ________ to the beach on Saturday.
What ________ you doing this weekend?
I (not/do) ________ anything special.
She (visit) ________ her cousins.
I love going to the beach during my holidays.
We planning are a trip to the mountains for the summer.
I'm going to spend the whole weekend relaxing.
Are going you sightseeing while you are in London?
What are your plans for the Christmas holidays?
We staying are at home this weekend to clean the house.
A future or related word for Vacaciones is '________'.
Vacation
